org.ralasafe
Class WebRalasafe

java.lang.Object
  org.ralasafe.WebRalasafe

public class WebRalasafe
extends java.lang.Object

Ralasafe Web Service.

This class contains three major methods for web application.

  1. User-Privilege relationship methods
  2. User query related methods
  3. User decision related methods

See Also:
Ralasafe

permit

public static boolean permit(HttpServletRequest req,
                             int privilegeId,
                             java.lang.Object businessObject)
Eval decision policy, return decision result.

Parameters:
req - HttpRequest, the login user be read from HttpSession with key USER_KEY
privilegeId - privilegeId
businessObject - business data
Returns:
decision result. true--permit; false--deny, deny reasion be store in request with key DENY_REASON
